user.title: Mijia Hygrometer Integration
user.description: This integration support auto discovery devices for Xiaomi Mijia BLE Temperature Hygrometer 2, If you want more detail information for this integration, please visit our project site: https://github.com/leonxi/mitemp_bt2/

abort.single_instance_allowed: This integration only allow single instance.
